physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mr. A was admitted for depression and received seven bilateral ECT treatments with improvement in symptoms.
Urine drug abuse test was negative, including absence of alcohol and benzodiazepines. Reported participation in a research study where he received a single intravenous ketamine infusion.
Urine drug abuse test was negative, reported consuming four drinks daily, admitted to using ketamine beyond prescribed recommendations.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reemergence of increasing alcohol use and misuse of ketamine noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Urine drug test was negative, including for alcohol. Reported moderate alcohol consumption (1-2 beers two or three nights a week).
